content: I'll definitely explore the different types of meditations on Insight Timer. I'm particularly interested in the loving-kindness meditation, as I've been feeling a bit overwhelmed with work and personal issues lately. I think it could help me cultivate more empathy and understanding towards myself and others. By the way, Father John's sermon about perseverance and faith at St. Mary's Catholic Church really resonated with me, and I'm hoping to incorporate those principles into my daily life. Do you think loving-kindness meditation could help me with that?
